testcase.name: Verify available products on inventory page
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify available products on inventory page Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 4.874s Then Verify user is on the inventory page ... passed in 0.050s Then Verify user should see 6 products listed ... passed in 0.022s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Verify sorting of products by different options -- @1.1
testcase.system-out:

@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
